body_html: Have you tried CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/opt/magma, because that's how it should be set? lib and include suffixes are added by FIND_LIBRARY and FIND_PATH. In Dockerfile CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH is used to locate magma in /opt/conda/envs/pytorch-py35/ without sed'ing FindMAGMA, and it works.
